content:
According to the Green Apple Books website, the next Poetry Book Club meeting after March 18th is scheduled for Thursday, April 15th.

The selected book for the April 15th meeting is **"Deaf Republic" by Ilya Kaminsky**. "Deaf Republic" is a highly acclaimed poetry collection that explores themes of politics, identity, and humanity. It's a powerful and thought-provoking book that's sure to generate a lively discussion.

Here are the details for the April 15th meeting:

* Date: Thursday, April 15th
* Time: 7:00 pm
* Location: Green Apple Books, 506 Clement St, San Francisco
* Selected Book: "Deaf Republic" by Ilya Kaminsky

As always, you can RSVP on the Green Apple Books website or by calling the store. And don't forget to pick up a copy of "Deaf Republic" before the meeting to get the most out of the discussion!
